explains: v. 排放，散发（尤指气体、辐射物）；发出（声音或噪音）；发行，发表

sentences.en: The metal container began to emit a clicking sound.
sentences.cn: 金属容器开始发出咔嗒咔嗒的声音。

sentences.en: These cars emit more than all the microwaves in the EU.
sentences.cn: 这些汽车发出的微波比欧盟所有的微波还多。

sentences.en: When submerged, they're also able to emit signals from depths of 20,000 ft.
sentences.cn: 潜入水中后，它们仍能从2万英尺深处发射信号。
